Is the author Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī?
With this is bound: Kitāb Shurūṭ al-imāmah / Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī (ff. 7r-9v) ; Risālah fī al-wādī al-muqaddas wa-mā yataʻallaq bihi (ff. 10r-16r).
